subject: Re: [junit] Class Not Found Error from a Command Line
msgSnippet: В Tue, 18 Aug 2009 21:35:28 -0000 ... not . bin but . bin somejar1.jar;. bin somejar2.jar... classpath contains class folder name and jar names. Not jar
messageBody:
В Tue, 18 Aug 2009 21:35:28 -0000
"Jeff Sexton" <elgintime@...> пишет:

> This is a common question, but just the same I can't see the trouble.
>
> On Windows with junit 4.1, I create a .bat file like so:
>
> set JARS=.\bin
> set JARS=%JARS%;..\somedir\lib\junit.jar
not ".\bin" but ".\bin\somejar1.jar;.\bin\somejar2.jar..."

classpath contains class folder name and jar names. Not jar folder name.

--
Sincerely yours,
Vitaliy Berdinskikh (Виталий Бердинских)
